ProjectTitle: Optimal design of flexible heat networks
InitialFeedbackHistory: 24/04/2024 [REDACTED] please note that RDR is a data repository for data publishing which preserves data as well, but can't be used just to preserve data without sharing, see https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr; if needed, you can find other storage solutions here: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en [REDACTED] please focus here on data, peer reviewed publications are not in the scope of a DMP. Please indicate under the 3rd question that IP may be a factor restricting sharing; where will you preserve data with IP, also in RDR or zenodo but under embargo? Please contact LRD (later in your project) if you are not sure which data you can and cannot share due to valorization potential
label: good with suggestions
